In [12]: def RescaleLumi(OldLumi,NewLumi,StringOfNumbers):
    ...:     w=NewLumi/OldLumi
    ...:     B=""
    ...:     for i in StringOfNumbers.split(" "):
    ...:         B+=" "+str(float(i)*w)
    ...:     return B
    ...: 

In [13]: RescaleLumi(3000.,100.,"137122684.75 98974934.75 86465977.5 64637133.25 47176654.6875 36992742.3125 31579634.375 139084618.0 173009.4
    ...: 88281 405503.6875 410283.59375 278564.59375 250348.875 203324.792969 613865.890625")
